title: Time Box: Kevin's Quest
description: This is a book about the Kingsley family adventures and the story of what happens when Kevin and his granddad discover the ‘Titanium Time Key and Time Box’ among Grandad’s artefacts. The key which, when activated in the Time Box, actually allows them to travel back or forward in time to any specific chosen place and date in order to put right any wrongs that have occurred and completely change the course of time and history for the better. Read their incredible story as they travel back in time to put right the biggest wrong that has occurred in their lives, namely the murder of Kevin’s father almost twenty years before.
author: Graham Knight
